Subskills.name: Desert's Sand
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of sand gush.

Subskills.name: Gushing Winds
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to increase the size and damage of tornados.

Subskills.name: Desert Cyclones
Subskills.description: Tornados spawn multiple small cyclones on hit.

Subskills.name: Piercing Sand
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by sand gush.

Subskills.name: Stranded Impact
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Gusting Winds
Subskills.description: Increases the speed of sand tornados.

Subskills.name: Desert Storm
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of sand tornados.

Subskills.name: Dust Devils
Subskills.description: Unleash small dust devils bouncing off of walls and unleashing a pulse of sand on hit.

Subskills.name: Overwhelming Sand
Subskills.description: Tornados have a chance on hit to inflict bleeding for a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Contaminated Wounds
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Tamed Winds
Subskills.description: Tornados now spin outwards following the nomad.

Subskills.name: Sandstorm
Subskills.description: Cast continuous gushes around you for a short period with increased radius and damage. Sand Gush now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Sand Tornado
Subskills.description: Send out a sand tornado casting sand gush continuously.
